xxl.core.util.reflect

Class RuntimeExtender

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.util.reflect.RuntimeExtender

  • public class RuntimeExtender
extends Object
    This class allows to extend a class at runtime in order to have a MetaData field and matching setter and getter-methods. Existing objects can be modified that way at runtime as well.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RuntimeExtender.ExtenderClassLoader
      Subclass of ClassLoader needed to call the protected methos definaClass.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static HashMap classes
      A HashMap containing classes which have already been generated at runtime.
      protected static HashMap prototypes
      A HashMap containing the serialized form of prototype objects from classes for which an instance was extended at runtime.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RuntimeExtender() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Class extendClass(Class cl)
      Extends a class at runtime.
      static Object extendObject(Serializable object)
      Returns a modified version of the given object which is a member of the subclass defined in extendClass(Class).
      static byte[] StringToByteArray(String s)
      Converts a string to an array of bytes.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        A HashMap containing classes which have already been generated at runtime.

    • Method Detail

      • StringToByteArray

        public static byte[] StringToByteArray(String s)
        Converts a string to an array of bytes.
        Parameters:
        s - the string to convert.
        Returns:
        the resulting array.

      • extendClass

        public static Class extendClass(Class cl)
        Extends a class at runtime. The resulting class supports public void setMetaData(Object) and public Object getMetaData() which both can be used by using javas reflection mechanism #main(String []).
        Parameters:
        cl - the class to extend
        Returns:
        a new class which is a subclass of cl

      • extendObject

        public static Object extendObject(Serializable object)
        Returns a modified version of the given object which is a member of the subclass defined in extendClass(Class).
        Parameters:
        object - the source object
        Returns:
        a new object which is a modified version of object
